text: He thought, he said, that the Soviet Union would be prepared to reach an agreement in a zone of controlled disarmament in Europe. Mr. Gaitskell concluded, declaring that the present was the beginning of a great period of opportunity for the party. It was a great chance that should be grasped. Inter-union jealousies prevent the fulfilment of a common policy for wages and other major questions, Mr. Jack Cooper, president, declared when congress opened.
handwritten_text: He thought, he said, that the Soviet Union would be prepared to reach an agreement in a zone of controlled disarmament in Europe. Mr. Gaitskell concluded, declaring that the present was the beginning of a great period of opportunity for the party. It was a great chance that should be grasped. Inter-union jealousies prevent the fulfilment of a common policy for wages and other major questions, Mr. Jack Cooper, president, declared when congress opened.
